name: CargoX
goal:
CargoX is a company offering digital courier services with the help of public blockchain.

Use cases range from transferring the documents of title -- such as bills of lading, and different kind of certificates -- to transfer of "regular" documents where identity, timestamp, immutability, and proof-of-delivery are of paramount importance.

By storing the document hash on the blockchain we are able to guarantee the document hasn't been changed, and the exact time of transfer.

The solution is applicable to any industry, including -- but not limited to -- global transport and logistics (including ocean, sea, train, road and air freight), law and legal, pharmaceuticals, automotive, and in the energy sector.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Fraud prevention, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: CargoX has an observer status within the DG-MOVE forum: https://ec.europa.eu/transport/home_en
